description: Whilst this notice is published for the value of £570,000 this value includes the provision of an additional 50% materiality subject to the provisions as stated in the tender documents. Therefore the spend on this Framework over its 4 year period is estimated at. £380,000. The nature of the requirement is ad-hoc therefore there is no guarantee the values published in this notice will be reached.

tender.title: TRN-21-005 Vehicle Bodywork Repairs
tender.description: To establish a Framework Agreement for Vehicle Bodywork Repairs. The requirement will be on a call off as required basis for vehicles that have been damaged, either minor or major, as a result of an accident.
